bug.author: Suikaba
bug.description:
There exists a dependency error of in the current blueoil (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/commit/964c64bfec797d30b9c9e1915b875618758a76c6>964c64b</denchmark-link> ). Following tutorials, I have run a docker command like this: <denchmark-code>docker run --rm -it \ -v $(pwd)/cifar:/home/blueoil/cifar \ -v $(pwd)/config:/home/blueoil/config \ blueoil_$(id -un):v0.27.0-1-g964c64b \ blueoil init -o config/cifar10_test.py </denchmark-code>
Then this error occured: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 582, in _build_master ws.require(__requires__) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 899, in require needed = self.resolve(parse_requirements(requirements)) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 790, in resolve raise VersionConflict(dist, req).with_context(dependent_req) pkg_resources.ContextualVersionConflict: (absl-py 0.9.0 (/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages), Requirement.parse('absl-py<0.9,>=0.7'), {'tensorflow-metadata'})
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/bin/blueoil", line 33, in <module> sys.exit(load_entry_point('blueoil', 'console_scripts', 'blueoil')()) File "/usr/local/bin/blueoil", line 25, in importlib_load_entry_point return next(matches).load() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/importlib_metadata/__init__.py", line 105, in load module = import_module(match.group('module')) File "/usr/lib/python3.6/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 994, in _gcd_import File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 971, in _find_and_load File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 955, in _find_and_load_unlocked File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 665, in _load_unlocked File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 678, in exec_module File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed File "/home/blueoil/blueoil/cmd/main.py", line 21, in <module> from blueoil.cmd.convert import convert as run_convert File "/home/blueoil/blueoil/cmd/convert.py", line 20, in <module> from blueoil.cmd.export import DEFAULT_INFERENCE_TEST_DATA_IMAGE, run as run_export File "/home/blueoil/blueoil/cmd/export.py", line 22, in <module> import tensorflow as tf File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow/__init__.py", line 102, in <module> from tensorflow_core import * File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow_core/__init__.py", line 28, in <module> from tensorflow.python import pywrap_tensorflow # pylint: disable=unused-import File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1007, in _handle_fromlist File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow/__init__.py", line 50, in __getattr__ module = self._load() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow/__init__.py", line 44, in _load module = _importlib.import_module(self.__name__) File "/usr/lib/python3.6/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow_core/python/__init__.py", line 52, in <module> from tensorflow.core.framework.graph_pb2 import * File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow_core/core/framework/graph_pb2.py", line 7, in <module> from google.protobuf import descriptor as _descriptor File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/google/protobuf/__init__.py", line 37, in <module> __import__('pkg_resources').declare_namespace(__name__) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 3267, in <module> @_call_aside File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 3251, in _call_aside f(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 3280, in _initialize_master_working_set working_set = WorkingSet._build_master() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 584, in _build_master return cls._build_from_requirements(__requires__) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 597, in _build_from_requirements dists = ws.resolve(reqs, Environment()) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 790, in resolve raise VersionConflict(dist, req).with_context(dependent_req) pkg_resources.ContextualVersionConflict: (absl-py 0.9.0 (/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages), Requirement.parse('absl-py<0.9,>=0.7'), {'tensorflow-metadata'}) </denchmark-code>
PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/1151>#1151</denchmark-link> may be related this issue.

comments.comment: Now, command works correctly. Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oatawa1>@oatawa1</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/iizukak>@iizukak</denchmark-link> !
